name: Lantern (itch) (CasperKDev)
description:
In LANTERN you try to find your way into an abandoned amusement park late at night. As you look around for a way in, you find a lantern. You light it up, and you enter a new world.

Controls:

Move left: A

Move right: D

Jump: Space

Toggle lantern: Mouse2

Submission for the AGES, SHS and SKILLS Halloween game jam 2022.

Credits:
